narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection to ensure the direct non-compliant item (2.40b2) cited on the previous inspection
report (dated 21 March 2014) was corrected.  All four dogs were examined by a licensed veterinarian and placed on
appropriate treatment plans.  The extremely thin Morkie (#0A02257345) now has a good body condition.  The two
Shiba Inus (#0A02255154 and #0A02315019) are no longer coughing.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
